page.title: 03MY HORNCHURCH HOME
page.content: My house is semi-detached. I have 7 rooms in my house. I have 1 bathroom, 1 toilet, 3 bedrooms, 1 kitchen and a combined living room and dining room. I would say that my house is about 20 years old(Ihave been there for about 9.5 years). My garden is probably an average size. At the bottom of my garden you can see a stream that eventually runs into the River Thames. My house is green and white with a red roof. At the back of my house I have got an extension where we keep our outdoor toys and my mum and dad's gardening tools. I think that my home is a nice place to live because everything I need is very near. All our family of 5 think we need a bigger house but we all want to stay in this area.
